Organic Sweet Potatoes

Organic Sweet Potatoes

Fruits and Vegetables Category

Description

Our Organic Sweet Potatoes are a testament to the taste and nutritional power of nature. Cultivated on small, family-run farms dedicated to sustainable and organic farming practices, these sweet potatoes receive plenty of sunshine and clean water, resulting in a superior product. Not only are they grown without the use of synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, but they`re also harvested by hand with care to ensure the highest quality. Sweet potatoes are known for their rich, sweet flavor and versatile use in both savory and sweet dishes. They`re a nutritional powerhouse, providing a high source of fiber, vitamins A and C, and minerals like iron and potassium, making them a great addition to any meal.

Specifications

  • Weight: 2 lbs per pack
  • Size: Large, each sweet potato approximately 5-6 inches in length
  • Packaging: Recyclable paper bag
  • Nutritional Information: High in fiber, vitamin A, vitamin C, manganese, and antioxidants

Benefits

  • Versatile Cooking Ingredient

    Perfect for a wide range of recipes, from baking to roasting.

  • Eco-Friendly Farming

    Grown using sustainable agricultural methods.

  • Nutrient-Dense Food

    A healthful boost with high vitamin content.
